H0.text: Taking glass bottles to a place that makes them into new bottles is an example of something being recycled.

H1.text: Using the same foil to cover food several times is an example of something being recycled.

H2.text: Wrapping glasses with newspaper to put them in a moving box is an example of something being recycled.

H3.text: Carrying lunch to school every day in the same plastic bag is an example of something being recycled.

A4.text: Glass recycling is the comprehensive process of collecting, processing, and re-manufacturing waste glass into new products.
